this_title: Randy Jackson Presents America's Best Dance Crew Season 7
trans_title: 全美街舞达人 第七季
introduction: The seventh season of America's Best Dance Crew, also known as America's Best Dance Crew: Return of the Superstars, premiered on April 11, 2012.[1] Return of the Superstars used the same show format of the previous season, in which the crews performed to the music of one specific artist each week.[2] The season featured artists including Rihanna, Britney Spears, Madonna, Pitbull, David Guetta, LMFAO, Jennifer Lopez, Drake, Flo Rida, and Katy Perry.[3] In the live finale, which aired on June 13, 2012, Elektrolytes was declared the winner.
chinese_title: 全美街舞达人 第七季
foreign_title: Randy Jackson Presents America's Best Dance Crew Season 7
